english: Base
Pick up your equipment in the next tent.
Well done! Now, you can go right to the front of the base and wait for sergeant Muday's squad or you can spend your time just walking around the base.
Follow the orders of your commander and go through the forest.
Chicago 4 base who's calling?
Yes, of course. Everything is alright, sir...
What today? I thought...
Ok, understand, sir... I'll take care of it.
Sir, yes sir!
You gotta be fucking kidding me!
Why the fuck are you screaming?
I'll tell you why! I'm going home, Phill!
Bullshit, you're going in a month.
Muday said there are some free places right now.\nOur entire squad is going, he'll be here in a minute.\nWe'll pack up and finally get out of here!
OK, so you lived to see the day. You should wait for him in front of the base.
Jason, what are you waiting for? Pick up your equipment and finally get out!
I am going home! Finally! I can wait no longer!
Hey, Joe, I'm going home!
Shut up, you Bolshevik mother fucker!
Hey, don't touch it! It's not for kids!
What do you want here?
Nothing?
Then get out!
Alright, boys, listen up. The day of leaving this island has come.\nSo if anybody wants to say something on the island’s address, say it now.
OK, the first stop is Montignac.\nYou are going to pack your stuff, then we're going to the airport where captain Wallsh is waiting for us.\nHe'll tell us what to do next. Any questions?
When is our flight?

In one and a half hours.\nUntil then, have your tents cleared, luggage packed, gear returned and everything else in its original state.\nIf you screw something up, I guarantee I'll cancel that flight. Understood?
Definetely.
Understood, sir.
Look, those guys didn't look like hunters, did they?
No, soldier, I saw them too. Driver, halt! We saw some guys with guns in that forest.\nLet's have a look.
No! Not now!
Shut up, Twombly! Get your ass up! Keep your eyes peeled. Hopefully, it's no trouble.
COME ON, YOU RUSSIAN FUCKER, GET IN!
PAPA BEAR, THIS IS ALPHA SQUAD. AT FD45 WE HAVE SEEN SOME FUCKERS IN COMBAT RAGS AND RIFLES. WE ARE GOING TO SEARCH THE FOREST SOUTH FROM US, OVER.
WHAT, ALPHA? PERHAPS IT'S NOTHING. WE'RE SENDING A BLACKHAWK TO YOU AND BRAVO SQUAD FROM THE NORTH. OUT.
PAPA BEAR, REPORTING CONTACT! A SQUAD OF UNIDENTIFIED FUCKERS IN FRONT OF US, OVER!
PAPA BEAR, WE ARE UNDER HEAVY FIRE FROM THE FOREST. TELL US WHAT THE FUCK IS GOING ON?
THIS IS MORTON. SOMEONE IS SHELLING US WITH GRENADES. WHAT'S HAPPENING?

SHIT. IT LOOKS LIKE WE ARE UNDER ATTACK. PAPA BEAR TO ALL UNITS. CODE RED, I SAY AGAIN, CODE RED! SEVERAL REBEL CONTACTS HAVE BEEN REPORTED. ALL UNITS ARE TO WITHDRAW TO THE TOWNS IMMEDIATELY AND HOLD UP THERE. PAPA BEAR OUT.
ALPHA AND BRAVO IT DOESN'T APPLY TO YOU. COMPLETE YOUR TASK AND THEN REPORT. OUT.
PAPA BEAR, ALPHA SQUAD'S REPORTING STATUS. WE WENT THROUGH THE FOREST AND SENT SEVERAL OF THOSE FUCKERS TO THE AFTERLIFE, BUT WE’RE NOT SURE IF THE AREA IS CLEAR. WE'RE WAITING FOR ORDERS, OUT.
TWOMBLY, WHERE THE FUCK ARE YOU? YOU SHOULD WAIT FOR ME, SHOULDN’T YOU? GET IMMEDIATELY BACK HERE!
WAIT FOR YOUR COMMANDER
